Name: Bloody Horde
About the game: Bloody Horde is a Co-op Survival Horror TPS set in multiple environments. You and your friends are dropped into these locations with a simple mission: Survive endless waves of hostile zombies and other undead creatures! CO-op with up to four players against multiple waves of enemies. Solo Mode for offline gameplay.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Bloody Horde? Check out the release date (Oct 9, 2020), developer insights from TC Games, and a complete game summary.
